slug.description: URL-friendly slug automatically generated from title

excerpt.description: Short excerpt/summary of the blog post (max 300 characters)

content.description: Main blog post content in rich text format

featuredImage.description: Featured image displayed at the top of the blog post

featuredImageAlt.description: Alt text for the featured image

author.description: Author name of the blog post

publishedDate.description: Publication date of the blog post

categories.description: JSON array of category names for this blog post

tags.description: JSON array of tag names for this blog post

enableArticleSchema.description: Whether to enable Article schema markup for SEO

openGraph.description: Open Graph metadata for social media sharing

excludeFromSitemap.description: Whether to exclude this blog post from the sitemap
